title: Check on an Existing Claim Status
description: A customer who filed a home insurance claim for water damage a week ago is calling for an update.

tasks.description: Identify the policyholder and locate their open claim.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the open water damage claim.

tasks.description: Review the claim notes to find the latest update.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reads the notes and finds that the adjuster has visited and is waiting for the repair estimate.

tasks.description: Provide a clear update to the customer and set the expectation for the next communication.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent informs the customer about the pending estimate and that the adjuster will call them within 2 business days.
